short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Twitch enhancement suite. Get custom emotes and tons of new features you'll never want to go without.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FrankerFaceZ is a Twitch enhancement suite that provides custom channel emotes, Twitch layout and chat customization, advanced chat moderation tools, and many more unique features designed to make Twitch a more pleasant and social experience for you and the channels you love.
